entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
